other_tests.findings: Bilateral and diffuse hypoechoic areas detected.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normal thyroid appearance on evaluation one month earlier.

other_tests.findings: Normal thyroid function; negative antibodies (TgAb, TPOAb), and ultrasound unremarkable.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Thyroid function became abnormal on March 19th.

other_tests.findings: Patient started at 25 mg/day; symptoms of neck pain and fever improved within two days.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved within one week; tapering of prednisone occurred.

other_tests.findings: FT4 concentration had declined to the upper normal range, TSH had risen to almost normal level.
